sections.heading: Limit of legal action6-835.Limit of legal actionNothing in this chapter shall limit any statutory or common law right of any person to bring an action in any court having jurisdiction for any act involved in the transaction of the escrow business or the right of the state to punish any person for an
sections.text: Limit of legal action6-835.Limit of legal actionNothing in this chapter shall limit any statutory or common law right of any person to bring an action in any court having jurisdiction for any act involved in the transaction of the escrow business or the right of the state to punish any person for any violation of any law based on such act.
